); case "bdo": return (
BDO Centers is a subsidiary of BDO Germany in Ukraine - a global consulting and auditing company. We develops and scales innovations across the largest and most diversified group of strategy, consulting, digital, audit, tax, and operations professionals in the world. Working as trusted advisors to our clients, we are focused on delivering value. We combine analytics with industry skills and technology in a way that is truly differentiated and delivers business outcomes as a service for our clients within the BDO network and worldwide to BDO customers. Every day, more than 80000 employees, working in 1500+ offices in 162 countries, support clients with practical advice and help them solve their problems.

BDO Centers LLC offers:
Challenging tasks that will never make you feel bored, Dynamic and friendly environment, Endless possibilities for self-development, Vast chances for career promotion, Official and competitive salary, Health insurance, Training, learning, and development programs.

We are hiring:
Research Expert, Business Analyst:
Good analytical skills, Business-oriented, Basic understanding of business running and economic models, Financial literacy, Upper-intermediate English Business English.

Graphic Designer:
A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphics, Familiarity with design software and technologies (such as InDesign, Illustrator, Dreamweaver, Photoshop), A keen eye for aesthetics and details, Excellent communication skills, Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines, Degree in Design, Fine Arts or related field is a plus, Intermediate English

Follow us in Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/20099998/
on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bdocenters
And on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4zU-fQC02Ltm6CGu9FY-OA
Do not hesitate to send your CV to katerina.krivozub@bdobusinessservices.com.ua
We are waiting for YOU!

); case "innoware": return (
Innoware - an expert in ERP, CRM, cloud business solutions implementation consulting services, works 19 years and successfully fulfilled more than 300 ERP-projects worldwide. Our company holds Microsoft Gold Certified Partner status and acknowledged as one of the best partners in Eastern Europe.

Our specialization:
Microsoft Enterprise Resource Planning system (ERP)
Microsoft Azure cloud platform for business solutions
Microsoft Dynamics CRM system

We designed a unique training and development system for newcomers, which creates experts in enterprise management systems implementation. We offer Internship Programs for students and fresh graduates in a field of business analysis and development. Internships are conducted quarterly.

Due to expansion of the business, we invite enthusiastic and promising individuals to join our team. Currently we have three positions opened in our company:
Junior Business Analyst (ERP systems)
Junior Business Analyst (Intern)
Junior Developer (Intern)

We offer excellent opportunities for successful career start and growth in friendly, supportive atmosphere:
Intensive training and professional development
International Microsoft certification
Challenging tasks
Participation in international projects
Competitive remuneration
Opportunity to finish education for students

Send your CV to IWwork@innoware.com
More information and vacancies https://innoware.com/uk

    ); case "city": return (
    While we're a global bank, our mission is simple: We responsibly provide financial services that enable growth and economic progress.

    Citi Ukraine has built its reputation and client base by providing innovative and value-added products and services to leading companies operating in the region. Citi has become a leading bank in Ukraine, serving over 400 multinationals and top tier Ukrainian corporations, through a branch in the capital of Ukraine - Kyiv, representing virtually all sectors of the Ukrainian economy. Citi is the bank of choice for many multinational corporations in Ukraine and is widely recognized as one of the most reliable banks in the country. Citi has been actively introducing new financial-sector technology and world-best practices in Ukraine.

    ); case "roland": return (
    Be what you dream of.

    Roland Berger, founded in 1967, is one of the world's leading strategy consultancies. Our consultants advise major international industry and service enterprises as well as public institutions, support financial services companies in their efforts to realign for the future. We help our clients globally and locally to adjust their strategies and organizational structure, optimize their distribution channels, processes and IT landscape, conduct risk management programs, and also implement our services.
    ); case "visa": return (
    As the world's leader in digital payments technology, Visa's mission is to connect the world through the most creative, reliable and secure payment network - enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive. Our advanced global processing network, VisaNet, provides secure and reliable payments around the world, and is capable of handling more than 65,000 transaction messages a second. The company's dedication to innovation drives the rapid growth of connected commerce on any device, and fuels the dream of a cashless future for everyone, everywhere. As the world moves from analog to digital, Visa is applying our brand, products, people, network and scale to reshape the future of commerce.

    At Visa, your individuality fits right in. Working here gives you an opportunity to impact the world, invest in your career growth, and be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace. We are a global team of disruptors, trailblazers, innovators and risk-takers who are helping drive economic growth in even the most remote parts of the world, creatively moving the industry forward, and doing meaningful work that brings financial literacy and digital commerce to millions of unbanked and underserved consumers.

    You're an Individual. We're the team for you. Together, let's transform the way the world pays.

    Student Opportunities:

    We are launching the New Graduate Development Program (NGDP), August 17th 2020. This 18-month program includes 3 rotations through Visa's functions, each lasting 6 months.

    The NGDP program supports Visa's mission to build a strong entry level pipeline of talent with cross-functional knowledge and experience.

    If you are graduating this summer, and are interested, reach out to us on:
    moshahee@visa.com

    ); case "goldman": return (
    We are a leading global financial services firm providing investment banking, securities and investment management services to a substantial and diversified client base that includes corporations, financial institutions, governments and individuals. We commit people, capital and ideas to help our clients, shareholders and the communities we serve to grow.

    OUR ENGINEERS DON'T JUST MAKE THINGS - WE MAKE THINGS POSSIBLE
    Change the world by connecting people and capital with ideas. Solve the most challenging and pressing engineering problems for our clients. Join our engineering teams that build massively scalable software and systems, architect low latency infrastructure solutions, proactively guard against cyber threats, and leverage machine learning alongside financial engineering to continuously turn data into action. Create new businesses, transform finance, and explore a world of opportunity at the speed of markets.

    USEFUL LINKS

    Careers Home Page: http://www.goldmansachs.com/careers/
    About our divisions: http://www.goldmansachs.com/careers/divisions/index.html
    Programs we offer: https://www.goldmansachs.com/careers/students/programs/index.html
